title: Youth of Peter the Great, The

sources.title: Youth of Peter the Great, The
sources.description: The original nane of this film (Germ.) - "Peters Jugend" The Russian name is "Yunost Petra". Director: Sergey Gerasimov Cast: Dmitri Zolotukhin, Tamara Makarova, Natalya Bondarchuk, Nikolay Yeryomenko (jr.), Oleg Strizhenov, Vadim Spiridonov...
